title: KE of rock dropped from ferris wheel

content.question: The kinetic energy of the rock when it is at the same height as point <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>D</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is most nearly

choices.label: <math alttext="one half m v squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half 2 m g R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half 4 m g R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mn>4</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half m, times, open parenthesis, v squared plus 4 g R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one half m, times, open parenthesis, v squared plus 4 g R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
